replies.bodyText: I named it after DefaultBiomeCreator but I suppose they aren't intrinsically related, so I'll change it.
replies.author: Shnupbups

timeline.bodyText: Currently there's the existing BuiltinRegistries- should this capitalisation match that?
timeline.author: Gegy

replies.bodyText: If anything, BuiltinRegistries should be changed to BuiltInRegistries. 'Builtin' is not a single word.
replies.author: Shnupbups

replies.bodyText: Vanilla text uses built-in, which is one hyphenated word.
replies.author: haykam821

timeline.author: YanisBft
